item.name: Dry cat food (Off-brand)
item.description: An off-brand bag of dry cat food that will nourish your cat. Will replenish 5% of your cat's hunger attribute.

item.name: Dry cat food (Brand name)
item.description: A brand name bag of cat food that will nourish your cat. Will replenish 10% of your cat's hunger bar.

item.name: Wet cat food (Off-brand)
item.description: A tin of off-brand wet cat food to nourish your cat. Will replenish 20% of your cat's hunger bar.

item.name: Wet cat food (Brand name)
item.description: A tin of brand name wet cat food to nourish your cat. Will replenish 35% of your cat's hunger bar.

item.name: Tap water
item.description: A dish full of water to rehydrate your cat. Will replenish 10% of your cat's thirst bar.

item.name: Filtered tap water
item.description: A dish full of filtered tap water to rehydrate your cat. Will replenish 25% of your cat's thirst bar.

item.name: Bottled water
item.description: A dish full of bottled water to rehydrate your cat. Will replenish 50% of your cat's thirst bar.

item.name: Enriched mineral water
item.description: A dish full of enriched mineral water to rehydrate your cat. Will replenish 75% of your cat's thirst bar.

item.name: Automatic cat water fountain
item.description: A water fountain that will automatically rehydrate your cat at timed intervals. Will replenish 100% of your cat's thirst bar.

item.name: Cat nip
item.description: A little, "pep," in your cat's, "step." Used to excite and give your cat a good high. Will replenish the cat's hearts bar.
